channel.title: How do i add dueling?to my delta?
channel.description: How do i add dueling???to my delta?

item.title: How do i add dueling?to my delta?
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

yash:

well i would suggest u make a command ::duel which teles u to the area but a little safe zone there… then you can just jump in but make it so that only 1 player can attack the person… or TRY using the search option im preety sure i saw a thread about it…

Then that’s just like a PK box with 1v1 combat. If you really wanted to do this it would probably involve lots of time programming as there are no tutorials that i am aware of that show you have to add dueling. Be sure to use the “search” bar and try to find a tut before asking questions like this!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add dueling?to my delta?
